mapper.select:
SELECT t.DEC_USER as DecUser, t.DEC_DATE as DecDate, t.DOC_ID as DocId, t.PROC_MAIN_ID as ProcMainId, t.DOC_TYPE as DocType FROM QLC_CHECK_DOCS_RCD t WHERE 1=1
AND t.PROC_MAIN_ID =#{ProcMainId}
AND t.DOC_TYPE =#{DocType} AND EXISTS ( SELECT CODE FROM QLC_C_CHECK_DOCS_RCD_TYPE_CODE WHERE PROJ_CODE=#{proj_code} AND CODE=t.DOC_TYPE )
order by t.DEC_DATE desc

SELECT DEC_USER as DecUser, DEC_DATE as DecDate, DOC_ID as DocId, PROC_MAIN_ID as ProcMainId, DOC_TYPE as DocType, OPTION_1 as Option1, OPTION_2 as Option2, OPTION_3 as Option3, OPTION_4 as Option4, OPTION_5 as Option5, OPTION_6 as Option6, OPTION_7 as Option7, OPTION_8 as Option8, OPTION_9 as Option9, OPTION_10 as Option10, OPTION_11 as Option11, OPTION_12 as Option12, OPTION_13 as Option13, OPTION_14 as Option14, OPTION_15 as Option15, OPTION_16 as Option16, OPTION_17 as Option17, OPTION_18 as Option18, OPTION_19 as Option19, OPTION_20 as Option20, OPTION_21 as Option21, OPTION_22 as Option22, OPTION_23 as Option23, OPTION_24 as Option24, OPTION_25 as Option25, OPTION_26 as Option26, OPTION_27 as Option27, OPTION_28 as Option28, OPTION_29 as Option29, OPTION_30 as Option30, OPTION_31 as Option31, OPTION_32 as Option32, OPTION_33 as Option33, OPTION_34 as Option34, OPTION_35 as Option35, OPTION_36 as Option36, OPTION_37 as Option37, OPTION_38 as Option38, OPTION_39 as Option39, OPTION_40 as Option40, OPTION_41 as Option41, OPTION_42 as Option42, OPTION_43 as Option43, OPTION_44 as Option44, OPTION_45 as Option45, OPTION_46 as Option46, OPTION_47 as Option47, OPTION_48 as Option48, OPTION_49 as Option49, OPTION_50 as Option50, OPTION_51 as Option51, OPTION_52 as Option52, OPTION_53 as Option53, OPTION_54 as Option54, OPTION_55 as Option55, OPTION_56 as Option56, OPTION_57 as Option57, OPTION_58 as Option58, OPTION_59 as Option59, OPTION_60 as Option60, OPTION_61 as Option61, OPTION_62 as Option62, OPTION_63 as Option63, OPTION_64 as Option64, OPTION_65 as Option65, OPTION_66 as Option66, OPTION_67 as Option67, OPTION_68 as Option68, OPTION_69 as Option69, OPTION_70 as Option70, group_id as groupId FROM QLC_CHECK_DOCS_RCD WHERE
DOC_ID = #{_parameter}
